dict.acceptation: 肩膀；（衣服的）肩部；山肩；路肩；
担负，承担；肩起，挑起；用肩顶…；

sent.orig: Tilt your head to one shoulder. Which shoulder does it touch?
sent.trans: 八．将你的头靠到你的肩膀上。你靠的是哪个肩膀？

sent.orig: Shoulder to shoulder,singing and lifting the red banners,we marched on.
sent.trans: 他们肩并着肩，唱着歌，举着红旗向前进。

sent.orig: Common to shoulder the main action, including soft shoulders, arched shoulders, such as broken shoulder shaking.
sent.trans: 常见的以肩部为主的动作包括柔肩、拱肩、碎抖肩等。

sent.orig: Common shoulder problems include: rotator cuff tendonitis or bursitis, dislocation, SLAP tear, and frozen shoulder.
sent.trans: 肩关节常见问题包括：肩袖撕脱性损伤或炎症、脱臼、冻结肩等。

sent.orig: We stood in front of the school gate shoulder to shoulder in the photo.
sent.trans: 相片中的我们比肩站立在学校大门前面。
